channel.title: [317] ::yell help [317]

item.title: [317] ::yell help [317]
item.dc:creator: @jads jads
item.description:
@jads wrote:

It goes into your customCommands method.

Also, use conventions + code tags, please.

if (command.startsWith("yell")) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 5) { if (playerRights == 0) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5); } else if (playerRights == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Mod] " +playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5)+ "."; } else if (playerRights == 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Admin] " +playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5)+ "."; } else if (playerRights == 3) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Owner] " +playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5)+ "."; } } }

Read full topic

item.title: [317] ::yell help [317]
item.dc:creator: @R4nger_0wnz R4nger 0wnz
item.description:
@R4nger_0wnz wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“pickup”)) {
String[] args = command.split(" ");
if(args.length == 5) {
if (playerRights == 1) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Mod] " +playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5)+ “.”;
} else if (playerRights == 2) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Admin] " +playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5)+ “.”;
} else if (playerRights >= 3) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Owner] " +playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5)+ “.”;
} else if (playerRights <= 0) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5);
}
}
}

My mate gave me that but were do i add,my mate told me but i get erroes pleaae help thanks. P.S IF SOME OF IT IS WONG PLEASE MAKE A BETTER ONE THANKS.

Read full topic
